sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"试图，努力，力图"之意。
means: attempt ：较正式用词，侧重已经开始，且希望完成，但常隐含着不一定有预期的结果。
try ：普通用词，可与attempt换用，但强调努力或尝试，后跟不定式表示努力或争取；后跟动名词表示尝试。
endeavour ：正式用词，指尽最大努力、认真地克服困难去做某事。
strive和endeavour一样，表示付出巨大努力，但strive侧重劳累与紧张，而不强调努力的结果。

sentence.Network_en: An attempt by anti-abortionists to tighten the rules was defeated.
sentence.Network_cn: 反堕胎者所作的加强法规的尝试失败了。

sentence.Network_en: Army officers plotted a failed attempt yesterday to seize power.
These feelings are likely to make people attempt to overthrow the system.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些情绪有可能促使人们想要推翻现行的体制。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French attempter, from Latin attemptare, from ad- 'to' + temptare 'to tempt'

entry.tran: 尝试，试图（尤指做困难的事）
entry.def: If you attempt to do something, especially something difficult, you try to do it.

example.ex: The only time that we attempted to do something like that was in the city of Philadelphia...
example.tran: 只有在费城那次我们曾试着做那样的事。

example.ex: Before I could attempt a reply he added over his shoulder: 'Wait there.'
example.tran: 还没等我回答他就回头又说了一句：“在那儿等着。”

entry.tran: （通常指不成功的）尝试，企图，试图
entry.def: If you make an attempt to do something, you try to do it, often without success.

example.ex: ...a deliberate attempt to destabilise the defence...
example.tran: 经过深思熟虑的破坏该防御的尝试

example.ex: It was one of his rare attempts at humour.
example.tran: 那是他极不常见的想要表现幽默的一次。

entry.def: An attempt on some-one's life is an attempt to kill them.

example.ex: ...an attempt on the life of the former Iranian Prime Minister.

entry.tran: （运动员创造纪录的）尝试，冲击
entry.def: In British English, if a sportsman or sportswoman makes an attempt on a sporting record, they try to beat it. In American English you say that they make an attempt to break it.

example.ex: Everything is almost ready for me to make another attempt on the record.
example.tran: 一切几乎都已准备就绪，就等我向纪录发起再一次冲击了。

means.word_mean: 1. earnest and conscientious activity intended to do or accomplish something;

sentences.sentence: "made an effort to cover all the reading material"
"they made an attempt on his life"
"He tried to shake off his fears"
"The infant had essayed a few wobbly steps"
"The police attempted to stop the thief"
"She always seeks to do good in the world"

means.word_mean: 2. enter upon an activity or enterprise

stems_affixes.word_buile: contempt[n.轻视,藐视;受辱,丢脸]+ible..的→adj.令人轻视的
contempt[n.轻视,藐视;受辱,丢脸]+uous……的→adj.表示轻蔑的,藐视的
tempt[v.诱惑,引诱;吸引,使感兴趣]+atious→adj.诱惑性的
at一再+tempt尝试→一再尝试→企图
con共同+tempt尝试→大家都能试下→没什么了不起→轻视,藐视
tempt[v.诱惑,引诱;吸引,使感兴趣]+ation表名词→n.引诱,诱惑;诱惑物
at一再+tempt尝试→一再尝试→企图
con共同+temn=tempt尝试→大家都能试下→没什么了不起→蔑视

stems_affixes.value_cn: 诱惑,引诱;吸引,使感兴趣
stems_affixes.word_buile: tempt尝试→v.诱惑,引诱;吸引,使感兴趣

Sentence.sentence: To show its early attempt to reinvent itself.
For some, the hardships of life without steady work eventually overwhelmed their attempts to keep their families together.
Facebook then attempts to make money by selling their data to advertisers that want to send targeted messages
By recapturing the attempt of the monarch and noting where they came from, the next scientist can figure out things like butterfly's age and its routing
As the brain attempts to force the unsteady hand to do its bidding, the tension between the two results in a more compressed, psychologically denser expression.

Well, as your union representative, I have to warn you that it would take quite a while to force management to replace the old machines and attempt to get you transferred may or may not be successful.

sentences.en: He attempted the exam but failed.
sentences.cn: 他试图通过考试, 但失败了。

sentences.en: He attempted to get in touch with them but without success.
sentences.cn: 他试图和他们联系, 但未成功。

means.word_mean: 尝试, 试图, 企图

sentences.en: After repeated attempts they finally succeeded.
sentences.cn: 经过反复尝试, 他们终于成功了。

jushi.english: We mustn't attempt unrestricted expansion regardless if it is within our capacity.
jushi.chinese: 我们不能不顾自己的能力企图无限制地发展。

jushi.english: If you wish it so much I shall attempt it.
jushi.chinese: 如果你希望做这件事,那我就试试吧。

jushi.english: A large robbery was attempted by the thieves.
jushi.chinese: 这些窃贼图谋进行一次大规模抢劫。
